Card_description: Will raise price of coal* resulting in less pollution and more tax revenue* but hinders economic growth in short term.
Helps seniors maintain a quality standard of living in retirement thus reducing inequality.
Public hospitals solve people's health problems and fill the gap in health opportunities between wealthy and less wealthy people.
High tax on tobacco products results in fewer kids starting to smoke* and in more adults quitting.
Reduces the amount of pollutants emitted from the burning of fossil fuels at an industrial facilities.
Empowers people to travel and ship cargoes more economically
Tech workers such as data analysts* engineers* contribute to economic growth.
Provides improved nutrition for low-income households.
Offers quality living conditions for low-income residents* contributing to sustainable communities.
Helps more citizens afford their first household.
Traveling by bike contributes to the health of a city and its residents.
Creates more jobs and improves the local economy.
Immunizations improve the health of citizens.
Protect unemployed workers to increase equity.
Water treatment reduces the volume of waste that is released into the ecosystem.
This includes access to health* and social protection benefits to improve quality of life.
Formulates minimum wage to protect workers.
Overfishing damages entire ecosystems and pollutes our oceans.
Provides resources and compassionate care for survivors.
Protect voters for a fairer election.
Residents learn how wildlife is affected by people's actions.
Wate reusage reclaims water from a variety of sources then treats and reuses it for beneficial purposes.
